Advisory.Description:
### Impact
Sandbox protection could be bypassed through access to an internal Smarty object that should have been blocked. Sites that rely on [Smarty Security features](https://www.smarty.net/docs/en/advanced.features.tpl) should upgrade asap.

### Patches
Please upgrade to 3.1.39 or higher.

### References
See [this article](https://srcincite.io/blog/2021/02/18/smarty-template-engine-multiple-sandbox-escape-vulnerabilities.html)

### For more information
If you have any questions or comments about this advisory please open an issue in [the Smarty repo](https://github.com/smarty-php/smarty)
